Iron ore price history As of 22 August 2025, iron ore was trading at around $101.57 per tonne, up by 1% from the start of the year ($100.61) and 3.6% higher than the same period last year ($98.00). Past performance is not a reliable indicator of future results. Iron ore price

results. Iron ore price forecast for 2025 and beyond As of 22 August 2025, third-party iron ore price forecasts indicated a softer outlook for the year ahead. Scotiabank expected iron ore to average $95 per tonne in 2025, marking a 13.6% fall from the 2024 average, with prices projected to move lower to $90 in 2026.. ING Think forecast an average of $100 per tonne for 2025, falling to $95 in 2026

ahead. Scotiabank expected iron ore to average $95 per tonne in 2025, marking a 13.6% fall from the 2024 average, with prices projected to move lower to $90 in 2026.. ING Think forecast an average of $100 per tonne for 2025, falling to $95 in 2026. The World Bank projected a similar trajectory, with iron ore forecast to average $95 in 2025 and declining further to $88 in 2026. Consensus among thes
